short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows the user to get information from Contrast conveniently in a Chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Contrast Chrome Extension is a must-have developer tool that allows you to see vulnerabilities as you navigate and develop your application directly from your browser.

• Connect any number of web applications to the extension to enable vulnerability discovery.
• View all vulnerabilities found in your code with an associated severity level.
• Get in-depth remediation advice and details for each vulnerability.

Contrast Security is the world’s leading provider of security technology that enables software applications to get highly accurate assessment without disruptive scanning. You can learn more about our latest products by visiting www.contrastsecurity.com.
